"I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications," David Cameron said in a statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson is a trusted aide and his departure is a blow to David Cameron , whose office had long insisted he would stay on despite the scandal.
